text: The Western Cape Department of Economic Development and Tourism (EDAT) is the department of the Western Cape government responsible for economic policy, economic planning and economic development within the province. It is also liable for promoting and developing the provincial tourism sector. As of May 2019, the political head of the department has been Provincial Minister David Maynier. He also oversees the Provincial Treasury. The non-political head is Solly Fourie. ==See also== *Economy of the Western Cape *Government of the Western Cape ==References== ==External links== *Western Cape Department: Economic Development and Tourism Category:Government of the Western Cape Category:Economy ministries Category:Tourism ministries
title: Western Cape Department of Economic Development and Tourism
